domain
Class ImagesManager

java.lang.Object
  domain.ImagesManager

public class ImagesManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the responsible of managing the images of the game.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator
          This nested class is the responsible of managing the image sequences.

Method Detail

instantiate

public static ImagesManager instantiate()
This method is used to get an ImagesManager instance following the Single-Town model

Returns:
an ImagesManager instance.

loadImage

public void loadImage(java.lang.String imageName,
                      java.io.File inputFile)
This method loads a BufferedImage from an input file File instance. If something causes an Exception, the image is not loaded.

Parameters:
imageName - The name that specify the ArrayList at wich the image will be contained. If the name already exists, then the image is added to the indicated ArrayList.
inputFile - The File instance wich represents an image.

getImage

protected java.awt.image.BufferedImage getImage(java.lang.String imageName)
This method is used to get a single BufferedImage from the imagesNamesMap.

Parameters:
imageName - The name specifying the ArrayList from wich to get the first BufferedImage.
Returns:
The first BufferedImage at the specifyied ArrayList. null if the imagesNamesMap is null or if the HashMap imagesNamesMap doesn't contains the given imageName at its KeySet

getImages

protected java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> getImages(java.lang.String imageName)
This method is used to get a single BufferedImage from the imagesNamesMap.

Parameters:
imageName - The name specifying the ArrayList from wich to get the ArrayList of BufferedImage.
Returns:
The ArrayList of BufferedImage for the given imageName. null if the imagesNamesMap is null or if the HashMap imagesNamesMap doesn't contains the given imageName at its KeySet

getAnimator

protected ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator getAnimator(Sprite sprite,
                                                   java.lang.String imagesName,
                                                   int animationPeriod,
                                                   double sequenceDuration,
                                                   boolean isRepeating)
This method is used to get an ImagesAnimator with a sequence of images

Parameters:
sprite - The Sprite asking for the ImagesAnimator instance
imagesName - The name specifying the desired set of images
animationPeriod - The period that indicates how often the ImagesAnimator setImage() method will be invoked.
sequenceDuration - The total amount of time that a sequence should take
isRepeating - A boolean value indicating if the ImagesAnimator should restart the sequence when it reaches or passes the end of it.
Returns:
an ImagesAnimator instance with a sequence of images loaded.
See Also:
ImagesManager.ImagesAnimator
